function: Create new to-do items with title and description fields
static_description: A form at the top of the page with a lavender background (#E6E6FA) and indigo (#6366F1) input field for title, indigo text area for description, and an indigo submit button labeled 'Add Task'.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Add Task' button creates a new task entry in the database with provided title and description, then clears the form fields.

resource_dependency.taskDataSchema: Database table 'tasks' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), description (text), isCompleted (boolean), createdAt (datetime), priority (enum: low, medium, high)

function: Edit existing to-do items including title and description
static_description: Each task item displays editable title and description fields when in edit mode. Edit icon appears on hover.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the edit icon transforms the task display into an editable form with pre-filled title and description fields. A save button confirms changes which updates the database record.

resource_dependency.taskDataSchema: Database table 'tasks' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), description (text), isCompleted (boolean), createdAt (datetime), priority (enum: low, medium, high)

static_description: Each task item includes a trash can icon positioned to the right side of the task row.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the trash can icon removes the task from the database and immediately updates the task list view without page refresh.

resource_dependency.taskDataSchema: Database table 'tasks' with fields: id (UUID), title (string), description (text), isCompleted (boolean), createdAt (datetime), priority (enum: low, medium, high)

function: Mark to-do items as completed with visual indication
static_description: Each task shows a checkbox next to the title. Completed tasks have a strikethrough title and faded text color.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the checkbox toggles the isCompleted status in the database and visually updates the task styling to show completion state with strikethrough text and checkmark icon.

function: Filter to-do items by status (all, active, completed)
static_description: Three indigo-colored filter buttons aligned horizontally above the task list: 'All', 'Active', 'Completed'. Default selection is 'All'.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any filter button updates the displayed task list to show only items matching the selected status while maintaining current search/filter context.

function: Search to-do items by keyword across titles and descriptions
static_description: A search bar with lavender background and indigo border positioned above the task list, featuring a magnifying glass icon.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing Enter after typing searches both title and description fields in real-time, updating the task list dynamically without page reload.

function: Browse all to-do items in a list view
static_description: Vertically stacked list of tasks on a lavender background, each task displayed in an indigo-bordered card showing title, truncated description, creation date, and action icons.

function: Display to-do items with clear visual distinction between completed and active tasks
static_description: Tasks are displayed in cards with either normal dark text for active tasks or light gray strikethrough text for completed tasks.

function: Provide a text input field for entering new task titles
static_description: Single-line text input field with placeholder 'Enter task title' styled with indigo border and lavender background at the top of the task creation form.

interaction_and_states.description: Pressing Enter focuses on the description textarea below for continued input flow.

resource_dependency.textareaStyle: multi-line indigo bordered box with lavender background

function: Include a text area for detailed task descriptions
static_description: Multi-line text area below the title input with placeholder 'Enter task description' and matching indigo border/lavender background styling.

resource_dependency.counterDisplayLogic: total = count(tasks); completed = count(tasks where isCompleted=true)

function: Show a counter displaying total and completed task numbers
static_description: Status bar beneath filters showing 'X tasks remaining' where X reflects live count of incomplete tasks out of total task count.

function: Enable task sorting by creation date or priority
static_description: Dropdown menu labeled 'Sort By:' with options 'Creation Date' and 'Priority', styled with indigo theme colors.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a sort option reorders the visible task list according to chosen criteria, preserving current filter/search settings.
